bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names re dan 熱疸 , heat dan -illness; huo huang 火黃 , fire jaundice. Pathological Condition of huang dan 黃疸 , yellow dan -illness, brought forth by heat evil. Yao xing lun 藥性論 Substance Entry long dan 龍膽 : 治時疾，熱黃 , “It cures seasonal ailments and heat jaundice ”. Re huo zhuo lan chuang 熱火灼爛瘡 , festering sores following scorching by heat and fire [1] Pathological Condition identical with huo chuang 火瘡 , fire sores. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ji 雞 quotes Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 : 除熱火灼爛瘡、癇痙 , “It removes festering sores following scorching by heat and fire , as well as epilepsy and spasms”.
